title: Louie Christopher Wee
text:
I am a Data Analyst and Researcher based in Kelowna, British Columbia.
 I am currently studying Data Analytics and Marketing at Okanagan College.
 I worked as a Research Officer at CTS Global Equity Group from 2015 to 2021, focusing on market sentiment, risk management, and the fundamental and technical analyses of global equity markets.
 I enjoy traveling, food and sports.
